alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Madison; Miami (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:54AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN CHAMPAIGN, CLARK, CENTRAL MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 430 AM EDT... At 353 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Urbana, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Urbana, London, Tipp City, New Carlisle, Northridge, Enon, St. Paris, South Charleston, Mechanicsburg, Choctaw Lake, Brown, Harmony, Lisbon, Brighton, Christiansburg, North Hampton, Lafayette, South Vienna, and Tremont City. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 44 and 79. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 69 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
